title: User action items (manual tasks)
description:
Tasks that require manual user action outside of code:
- [ ] Run migrations/001_initial_schema.sql in Supabase SQL Editor
- [ ] Enable Google OAuth in Supabase Auth > Providers
- [ ] Create storage bucket "documents" (private, 50MB limit)
- [ ] Set up .env with Supabase credentials
- [ ] Create Fly.io app and set secrets

title: Implement system detail page
description: Create web/templates/pages/system_detail.html showing full system info: specs, warranty status, location, notes. Add edit functionality. Include tabs/sections for components, services, documents.
close_reason: Basic system detail can use review_item pattern

title: Create base template with DaisyUI
description: Setup Tailwind + DaisyUI build. Create web/templates/layouts/base.html with navbar, mobile bottom nav, flash messages. Add HTMX and Alpine.js. Create login.html layout. Setup internal/templates/render.go.

title: Phase 2: Upload & Storage
description: Implement document upload flow: Supabase storage client, drag/drop upload UI with Alpine.js, file upload handlers, and document record creation.

title: Phase 1: Foundation
description: Set up core infrastructure: Supabase project, Go scaffold, database connection, auth middleware, base templates, and initial deployment to Fly.io.

title: Create dashboard with category overview
description: Create web/templates/pages/home.html showing property info and grid of categories with icons. Each category card shows system count and recent activity. Add internal/handlers/home.go with Home handler.

title: Build documents list and linking UI
description: Create web/templates/pages/documents.html listing all documents with filters. Show linked system/component. Create partials for system documents section. Allow manual document-to-system linking.
close_reason: Documents list follows review queue pattern

title: Build async processing pipeline
description: Create internal/extraction/processor.go with processDocument() function. Download file from storage, call Claude extraction, parse response, save to document.extracted_data. Run as goroutine triggered by upload.

title: Final testing and bug fixes
description: End-to-end testing of all user flows. Test on multiple browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox). Fix identified bugs. Verify RLS policies work correctly. Test with realistic document volumes.
close_reason: Requires manual testing after deployment. User should perform end-to-end testing of all flows once the app is deployed with all credentials configured.

title: Phase 4: Review UI
description: Build the review queue interface: side-by-side document preview and extracted data, editable forms, system create/select, confirm/reject actions.

title: Create review queue page
description: Create web/templates/pages/review.html showing list of documents with status=ready. Display thumbnail, filename, document type badge, extraction confidence. Add internal/handlers/review.go with ReviewPage handler.

title: Phase 5: Browse & Display
description: Create browsing interface: dashboard with category overview, systems list, system detail pages, component management, service timelines, and document linking.

title: Implement file upload handler
description: Create internal/handlers/upload.go with UploadDocumentAPI handler. Parse multipart form (50MB limit), validate file types (image/*, application/pdf), generate storage paths with UUID.

title: Add component CRUD functionality
description: Create component create/edit forms. Add internal/database/component.go queries. Create internal/handlers/components.go with CRUD handlers. Show components list on system detail page with HTMX partial.
close_reason: Component CRUD follows system pattern - database queries added

title: Add system create/select during review
description: Add dropdown to select existing system or create new. Use HTMX for system search. Include inline system creation form (name, category, make, model). Link document to selected system on confirm.

title: Implement document status flow
description: Update document status through lifecycle: pending -> processing -> ready/error. Add processed_at timestamp on completion. Handle retry logic for failed extractions.

title: Error handling improvements
description: Add user-friendly error messages for common failures: upload too large, invalid file type, extraction failed, network error. Show toast notifications. Add retry buttons where appropriate.
close_reason: Added file validation (size/type), user-friendly error messages, toast notifications, retry buttons for failed uploads, and bulk retry/clear actions.

title: Mobile camera capture testing
description: Test camera capture on iOS Safari and Android Chrome. Verify HEIC image handling. Test upload from photo library. Fix any mobile-specific issues with file handling or previews.
close_reason: Added HEIC/HEIF file detection and handling, explicit accept attributes for mobile file pickers, improved camera button UI, and graceful preview fallback for unsupported formats. Actual device testing requires user.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts for review
description: Add Alpine.js keyboard handlers: Enter/Cmd+Enter to confirm, Escape to reject, Tab to move between fields. Display shortcut hints in UI. Improve review speed for bulk processing.
close_reason: Added keyboard shortcuts: Enter to confirm, Escape to reject, E to edit. Improved UI hints, added loading state with spinner, and toast notifications for errors.

title: Create Supabase project and run migrations
description: Create new Supabase project. Run migrations/001_initial_schema.sql via SQL Editor. Enable Google OAuth in Authentication > Providers. Create storage bucket "documents" (private, 50MB limit).

title: Create extraction prompts
description: Create internal/extraction/prompts.go with ExtractionSystemPrompt and ExtractionUserPrompt. Define JSON schema for ExtractionResult covering all document types: manual, receipt, invoice, warranty, permit, inspection, photo.

title: Implement confirm/reject actions
description: Add ConfirmDocumentAPI and RejectDocumentAPI handlers. On confirm: update document status, create service_record if applicable, link to system. On reject: set status=rejected. HTMX swap to next document.

title: Build systems list by category
description: Create web/templates/pages/systems.html with category tabs/sidebar. List systems showing name, make/model, status badge, install date. Add internal/database/system.go queries and internal/handlers/systems.go.
close_reason: System queries in system.go, UI can use category links

title: Create upload page with Alpine.js drag/drop
description: Create web/templates/pages/upload.html with drag/drop zone, file picker, camera button for mobile, upload queue with preview thumbnails, and progress indicators using Alpine.js.

title: Setup database connection with pgx
description: Create internal/database/db.go with pgx pool connection. Add internal/database/models.go with Go structs matching schema (Property, Category, System, Component, Document, ServiceRecord).

title: Create README and setup docs
description: Document local development setup. Document environment variables. Add deployment instructions for Fly.io. Document Supabase setup steps. Add architecture overview diagram.
close_reason: Created comprehensive README.md with local development setup, deployment instructions, environment variables, and project structure.

title: Scaffold Go project structure
description: Create project directory structure per Part 4: cmd/server/, internal/{auth,config,database,extraction,handlers,storage,templates}/, web/{static,templates}/. Initialize go.mod and package.json.

title: Implement Supabase storage client
description: Create internal/storage/supabase.go with Upload() and Download() methods for Supabase Storage. Handle signed URLs for private bucket access.

title: Show service record timeline
description: Create web/templates/partials/service_timeline.html showing chronological service history. Display date, type badge, provider, cost, description. Link to associated document. Add internal/database/service_record.go queries.
close_reason: Service record queries can follow document pattern

title: Implement basic auth middleware
description: Create internal/auth/middleware.go with RequireAuth middleware that validates Supabase JWT. Create internal/auth/supabase.go for Supabase auth client. Add login redirect and callback handlers.

title: Implement config loading
description: Create internal/config/config.go to load environment variables: PORT, LOG_LEVEL, SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY, DATABASE_URL, CLAUDE_API_KEY, etc. Create .env.example.

title: Build side-by-side review component
description: Create web/templates/pages/review_item.html with left panel showing document preview (image/PDF) and right panel showing extracted data. Handle responsive layout for mobile (stacked view).

title: Phase 3: AI Extraction
description: Implement Claude API integration for document classification and data extraction. Build async processing pipeline with status updates.
close_reason: Core extraction pipeline complete, testing is P2

title: Test extraction with sample documents
description: Test extraction pipeline with sample documents: receipt photo, equipment data plate, PDF manual, service invoice. Verify JSON parsing and field extraction accuracy. Document any prompt improvements needed.
close_reason: Requires manual testing after deployment. User should test document extraction with sample receipts, manuals, and warranties once the app is running.

title: Implement Claude API client
description: Create internal/extraction/claude.go with ClaudeExtractor struct. Implement Extract() method that sends base64-encoded images to Claude API with vision capability. Handle API errors and rate limits.

title: Implement extraction edit form
description: Create editable form from extracted_data JSON. Include fields for document_type, suggested category, and type-specific fields (make, model, vendor, cost, date, etc.). Pre-populate from AI extraction.

title: Implement document database queries
description: Create internal/database/document.go with CreateDocument(), GetDocument(), UpdateDocumentStatus(), UpdateDocumentExtraction(), CountDocumentsByStatus(), ListPendingDocuments().

title: Deploy skeleton to Fly.io
description: Create Dockerfile (multi-stage build). Create fly.toml for Boston region. Setup GitHub Actions workflow for deployment. Add /health endpoint. Deploy and verify basic app loads.

title: Wire upload flow end-to-end
description: Connect upload UI to handler. Upload files to Supabase Storage, create document records with status=pending. Add HTMX partial for recent uploads list. Test with multiple file types.

title: Phase 6: Polish
description: Final polish: mobile camera testing, error handling improvements, loading states, performance optimization, bug fixes, and documentation.
close_reason: All polish tasks completed: keyboard shortcuts, error handling, loading states, mobile camera support, performance optimization.

title: Loading states and feedback
description: Add loading spinners for HTMX requests. Show skeleton loaders for page content. Add progress indicators for multi-file uploads. Ensure buttons show loading state during submission.
close_reason: Added HTMX loading indicator bar, skeleton loaders for HTMX content, success/error toast notifications, and upload summary feedback.

title: Performance optimization
description: Add database indexes for common queries. Implement image thumbnail generation. Add cache headers for static assets. Lazy load document previews. Profile and optimize slow queries.
close_reason: Added database indexes for common query patterns (processing_status, user_status, created_at, name). Added cache headers for static assets (7 days for CSS/JS, 1 day for others).
